Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo has been described as a total genius by FIFA for the manner in which he won a penalty against Ghana in his nations opening World Cup match.

articles.author: Andrew French
articles.title: Watford and Blackpool draw friendly in Spanish sun - Watford Observer
articles.description: Watford rounded off their week in the Spanish sun with a 1-1 draw against Blackpool in a friendly
articles.content:
A Keinan Davis goal two minutes before half time earned Watford a 1-1 draw with Blackpool in their friendly, played in the Pinatar Arena in Murcia, Spain.
The game came at the end of a week-long tri… [+1643 chars]

articles.title: Middlesbrough win Hibernian friendly as Michael Carrick experiments with his side - Teesside Live
articles.description: The match report as Middlesbrough took on Hibernian at Easter Road in a friendly
articles.content:
A much-improved second half performance saw Middlesbrough win their World Cup-break friendly at Hibernian.
